thread.section_title: New World Beijing Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Hotel
thread.title_full: Excellent Hotel - Review of New World Beijing Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: FenixJS
title: Excellent Hotel
text:
Just completed a great stay at New World.
Special thank you to Hannah in the residence club who provided exemplary service & always remembered my name.
Also thank you to Albert who is a master of his craft, and probably the hotel's best asset.
Residence club is worth the extra $, particularly if you will be spending a bit of time inside the hotel.
Only issue is the location isn't really ideal for business / nightlife, but should be suitable for tourists.
